Github

ExcelJEE - Online Coaching Web-app

Github Project

Online Coaching System alike web-app build using HTML, CSS, EJS, Nodejs, Express, MongoDB and Heroku. Project facilitates rich features like online zoom meetings, time-table, downloadable notes & pdfs, user/admin/teacher dashboard.

April 2021 - June 2021

Covid website

Github Project

A simple covid tracker and awareness static website for quick information like total number of cases, active, and deceased. Emergency numbers and precaution measures. The site is built using HTML, CSS and Javascript.

Interests

Apart from being a web development enthusiast, I enjoy most of my time reading and exploring stuffs. I love being in nature and getting more in touch with peace.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and OTT shows, I love writing sometimes, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the web development & computer science world.
